overview:
Jayson Ayers is VP of Sales at OneRiot, the advertising network for the realtime social web. Jayson has over 15 years of experience driving online advertising sales and business development efforts. Before joining OneRiot, Jayson was VP of Sales and Marketing at StillSecure, a leading provider of commercial and open source network security solutions currently used by some of the world’s largest enterprises.

Prior to StillSecure Jayson was Sr. Director of Marketing at Xaffire, where he managed all media purchasing and direct response marketing. Jayson was also Founder and Managing Partner of Boulder Interactive, a premier provider of online advertising and interactive design services acquired by venture capital firm Fast Ideas. Prior to that, Jayson was part of the Worldprints.com founding team, which was among the world’s top 100 most visited web sites when it was acquired by Excite@Home in April 2000.

Jayson began his career as a Campaign Director for the full service marketing firm, Boulder Marketing Agency, managing accounts such as Brown-Foreman Beverages Worldwide, Case Logic, and JVC.Jayson is a graduate of Mississippi State with a Bachelor of Arts in Psychology. Follow Jayson on Twitter @jaysonayers
